description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. Dark cream glazed paper with laid lines visible. Foliation in pencil using Western numerals. According to the colophons, text 1 was copied in Iṣfahān in Rajab 1022 (fol. 29a), and text 3 in 1022 (fol. 64a).
author: ʻĀmilī, Bahāʼ al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn, 1547-1621
contents: 9. 69b-73a: [Answers to three questions on al-Bayḍawī's and al-Ṭabarsī's commentaries of some Qurʼanic verses].
title: al-Ithnā ʻasharīyah al-ṣawmīyah ; Ḥall laṭīf li-ʻibārah muʻḍilah fī Qawāʻid al-aḥkām ... [etc.].
creator: عاملي، بهاء الدين محمد بن حسين
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
